title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 323.2 - Basis of credits to operating revenue accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 323.2 - Basis of credits to operating revenue accounts

State Regulations

Credits to the operating revenue accounts shall be made
on the basis of the net tariff rates. Discounts forfeited for delayed payments
shall be credited to account 1612, Customers' Forfeited Discounts. Corrections
of overcharges and overcollections theretofore credited, authorized abatements
and allowances, and other corrections shall be charged to the revenue accounts
to which they relate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
323.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
